ModMetaData.name: NewRatkinPlus
ModMetaData.author: Gloomylynx Nukafrog
ModMetaData.description:
New Ratkin Race Mod. What is different from the old version?
- Rebalance race stat and equipment - Add new clothes and weapons - Add fuctional and race characteristics. - Add race research - Add a variety of different jobs and fashions. - Add BackStory
Ratkin weapons have the following characteristics. + Higher penetration - Lower Damage and Short Range
Ratkin's equipment consists of a total of 3 tires. And from 2 tires, it adds a professional effect.
The Ratkin Kingdom, where you meet, will be merciful.
Storyteller Rotty Milden - Increases the frequency of minor accidents - Reduces the frequency of major accidents. - Mitigated the destruction of events by overlapping events with complete randomness.
